Date: Thursday, 5/1/1978
Subject: Progress of Dick Davis
Dear Sir,
Dick Davis has an AVG of .312 at AA Chattanooga Lookouts!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Progress of Glenn Burke
Dear Sir,
Glenn Burke is hitting the ball well at AA Chattanooga Lookouts!
He has an AVG of .355, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
